about.label: About Me
about.title: Turning Business Complexity Into Clean Systems
paragraphs: Over the past 5+ years, I've been helping organizations — from schools and foundations to finance departments and growing businesses — replace manual processes with reliable digital systems.

My work spans across education, finance, HR, and internal operations. I've built student admission systems, boarding school financial platforms, multi-school ERP solutions, custom CMS platforms, and automated notification bots.

What sets me apart isn't just technical skill — it's the ability to sit with stakeholders, understand their pain points, and translate messy business logic into structured, maintainable software. I don't just build features; I solve operational problems.

traits.title: Business-First Thinking
traits.description: I don't just write code — I understand the problem. Every feature is designed around the actual workflow, not assumptions.

traits.title: Structured & Scalable
traits.description: Clean architecture, proper documentation, and maintainable code. Built to last and easy for teams to work with.

traits.title: Long-Term Mindset
traits.description: I build systems meant to evolve. Modular design, clear data models, and thoughtful technical decisions for future growth.

traits.title: Reliable & Communicative
traits.description: Consistent updates, transparent timelines, and honest about constraints. No surprises, just steady progress.

services.label: Services
services.title: Solutions, Not Just Code
services.description: Every service starts with understanding your problem. I deliver working systems that solve real operational challenges.

items.title: Custom Web Applications
items.problem: Your business relies on generic tools that don't fit your actual workflow, slowing down operations and creating data silos.
items.solution: I build tailored web applications designed around your specific processes — from dashboards to complex multi-role platforms.
items.benefit: A system that fits your team like a glove, reduces manual work, and scales with your growth.

items.title: ERP & Internal Systems
items.problem: Managing operations across departments with spreadsheets and disconnected tools leads to errors, delays, and zero visibility.
items.solution: I develop integrated ERP systems that connect departments — from inventory to procurement, reporting to user management.
items.benefit: One unified system that gives management real-time visibility and teams a streamlined workflow.

items.title: CMS with Page Builder
items.problem: Your marketing team can't update the website without bothering developers, causing bottlenecks and outdated content.
items.solution: I build custom CMS platforms with drag-and-drop page builders, giving your team full control over content and layout.
items.benefit: Marketing autonomy. Update pages, create landing pages, and manage content — no code required.

items.title: Financial & Accounting Systems
items.problem: Financial reporting is manual, error-prone, and takes days. Reconciliation between systems is a nightmare.
items.solution: I build financial systems with automated calculations, multi-period reporting, journal entries, and audit trails.
items.benefit: Accurate financials on demand. Less manual work, fewer errors, and reports ready when you need them.

items.title: Attendance, HR & Payroll Systems
items.problem: Tracking attendance, managing leave, and calculating payroll manually is time-consuming and error-prone.
items.solution: I develop HR systems with attendance tracking, leave management, payroll calculation, and employee self-service portals.
items.benefit: Automated HR processes that save hours of admin work every pay period and keep employees informed.

items.title: Mobile Applications
items.problem: Your users need access on the go, but building separate iOS and Android apps doubles your cost and timeline.
items.solution: I build cross-platform mobile apps with Flutter that run natively on both platforms from a single codebase.
items.benefit: One development effort, two platforms. Native performance with faster delivery and lower cost.

items.title: Automation & Integration
items.problem: Repetitive tasks eat up your team's time. Systems don't talk to each other, creating manual data entry bottlenecks.
items.solution: I build automated workflows — WhatsApp bots for notifications, API integrations between systems, and scheduled processes.
items.benefit: Less repetitive work, fewer human errors, and systems that communicate seamlessly.

items.title: Student Admission System
items.problem: A private school managed student admissions through paper forms and spreadsheets, leading to lost documents, duplicate entries, and weeks of processing delays during enrollment season.
items.solution: Built an end-to-end digital admission platform with online registration, document uploads, automated screening, interview scheduling, and real-time status tracking for parents.
items.impact: Reduced admission processing time by 70%. Eliminated paper forms entirely. Parents received instant updates, and staff could manage 3x more applications per season.

items.title: Boarding School Finance System
items.problem: A boarding school with 500+ students tracked tuition payments, operational expenses, and financial reports using Excel — causing reconciliation errors and delayed reporting to stakeholders.
items.solution: Developed a comprehensive financial system with automated billing, payment tracking, multi-period reporting, journal entries, and role-based access for finance staff and management.
items.impact: Monthly financial closing reduced from 5 days to 1 day. Payment collection tracking improved by 90%. Management gained real-time financial dashboards.

items.title: Educational ERP Platform
items.problem: An educational foundation running multiple schools had no unified system — each school used different tools for academics, HR, finance, and student management.
items.solution: Built a multi-tenant ERP platform covering student management, academic records, attendance, HR, payroll, inventory, and financial reporting — all in one unified system.
items.impact: Unified 4 schools under one platform. Reduced administrative overhead by 60%. Foundation leadership gained cross-school reporting and analytics.

items.title: Custom CMS with Page Builder
items.problem: A growing organization needed to frequently update their website but depended on developers for every small change, creating bottlenecks and outdated content.
items.solution: Created a custom CMS with a visual page builder, reusable component library, media management, SEO tools, and role-based publishing workflows.
items.impact: Marketing team became fully autonomous — publishing new pages in minutes instead of days. Developer dependency for content updates dropped to zero.

items.title: HR & Attendance Management
items.problem: A company with 200+ employees tracked attendance through manual sign-in sheets and calculated payroll on spreadsheets, leading to disputes and payroll errors.
items.solution: Built an integrated HR platform with digital attendance (QR/GPS), leave management, overtime calculation, payroll processing, and employee self-service.
items.impact: Payroll processing time cut by 80%. Attendance disputes reduced to near-zero. Employees gained transparency through self-service portal.

items.title: WhatsApp Notification Bot
items.problem: A school manually sent payment reminders, announcements, and report notifications to parents via individual messages — consuming hours of staff time daily.
items.solution: Developed an automated WhatsApp bot integrated with the school's existing systems, sending templated notifications for payments, attendance, grades, and announcements.
items.impact: Staff saved 3+ hours daily on communication. Payment reminder effectiveness improved by 45%. Parents appreciated instant, consistent updates.

workStyle.label: How I Work
workStyle.title: A Process Built on Trust & Transparency
workStyle.description: I believe great software is built through honest communication, structured processes, and a commitment to quality.

steps.title: Clear Communication
steps.description: Every project starts with deep understanding. I ask the right questions, document requirements clearly, and keep you updated at every stage — no technical jargon, just honest progress reports.

steps.title: Structured Development
steps.description: I follow clean architecture patterns, write well-documented code, and use version control rigorously. Every decision is intentional and traceable.

steps.title: Iterative Delivery
steps.description: I build in phases — starting with core functionality and iterating based on your feedback. You see progress early and often, not just at the end.

steps.title: Long-Term Partnership
steps.description: My goal isn't just to deliver and disappear. I build systems I'm proud to maintain. Post-launch support, optimization, and feature additions are part of the relationship.
